RelatedSentence: Rome , May 19 - Premier Matteo Renzi on Monday said the coming week will be key for Italy 's schools .

A1: money will be earmarked for construction of schools
RelatedSentence: In a post on his Twitter feed , Renzi said that money will be earmarked for construction of schools , with mayors joining the national government in making this a priority .

Renzi has previously said investments in schools were important to his government and he has been visiting schools about once a week around the country .
